§7골렘 강화§r
(탄약: 철 블록 1개)

§o참고:
당신이 소환하는 철 골렘은 마을 사람들이 만든 골렘처럼 공격하면 당신을 공격할 것입니다.§r
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/gold: 주문에 사용하는 황금 사과는 먹을 수 없습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/no_a: 당신은 무거운 갑옷을 입는 것보다 돌아다니는 것을 선호합니다. 어떤 종류의 흉갑이나 바지도 입을 수 없습니다. 그러나 기본 이동 속도는 일반 플레이어보다 빠릅니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/no_w: 물리적인 무기를 잘 사용하지 못하므로 칼이나 도끼를 사용할 때 영구적인 나약함 2가 생깁니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.marshmallow/reso: 당신이 화염 피해를 입을 때마다 당신은 바삭함 수준을 높여 당신의 체력을 낮추고 긍정적인 버프를 줍니다. 그러나 당신이 꿀 병을 마실 때마다 당신은 바삭함 수준을 잃습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.marshmallow/melt: 당신은 수영을 할 수 없고 물에 가라앉습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/compound_vi: 당신의 큰 눈은 어두운 곳에서 볼 수 있도록 적응했습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/easy_evasio: 나방은 그 자체의 장점이 있기 때문에, 당신은 자연스럽게 더 가볍습니다. 당신은 낙하 피해와 속도에 기초한 피해에 면역이 있습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/expulsion.d: 당신은 보고 있는 방향으로 스스로를 날릴 수 있습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/flammable_b: 몸과 날개가 가벼워서 타는 것을 견디지 못하고 2배의 화염 피해를 입습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/light_affin: 당신은 빛에 푹 빠져 있기 때문에 다양한 광원 주위에서 다양한 버프를 얻을 수 있습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/overwhelmin: 당신의 눈은 오직 어둠과 적은 빛에 익숙합니다. 태양은 당신이 받아들이기에 너무 과합니다. 당신은 태양이 있는 곳에서 압도되고 약해진 느낌을 받습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.moth/short.name: Short
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/boost.d: You can flap your wings to give you a small upwards movement when flying.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/lantern: When nearby a lantern you get regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/no_food: You can only eat leather, and rabbit hide.
power.origins-plus-plus.mothling/small.d: You're smaller and have less hearts.
Armor weighs you down, at most you can only wear a mix of iron and chainmail.
When nearby a soul lantern you get mining fatigue.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/hi: You can activate a higher jump, but you'll lose hunger a lot faster. You also take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/ra: You're able to lunge forward at a high speed. Attacking something while lunging at it will deal extra damage and knock it into the air.
power.origins-plus-plus.mountain-goat/th: It's easier to live in colder biomes with your thick wool coat, making you faster. In hot biomes however, you overheat and become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/a_mouses_l: You are very small, your frail body makes it so you have 5 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/mischievou: Mouses are quick, you can travel greater distances in a short amount of time.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/mob_ally.d: Zombies, Skeletons, and Creepers are all your allies and will not attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/ride.name: Riding
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/yoink.desc: When hit by an opponent, there's a chance to replace their currently held item with a wooden hoe.
power.origins-plus-plus.mouse/yoink.name: Yoink
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/launch: Propel yourself in the direction you are looking.
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/pocket: You can store up to 9 items in your mouth that you won't lose upon death.
power.origins-plus-plus.ninetails/willow: [아이템 단축 바 저장하기 키] 화염구를 발사할 수 있습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/air_s: You faster than normal in the air thanks to your affinity with it.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/bysta: To act is to interfere, and thus you deal massively reduced direct damage due to your reluctance.
Fire is bright, garish, and violent. An antithesis to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/float: You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/rayca: Aim at an entity to strike it with a sudden crippling terror, afflicting wither.
power.origins-plus-plus.panoptican/toggl: You can toggle seeing entities through blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/alrea: Your skin is already made out of iron, so you cannot wear any armour that is not better than iron armour
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/boili: You will catch fire due to overheating in very hot biomes
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/effec: You don't suffer from any negative status effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/heavy: Due to your iron skin, You are heavy, strong and slow
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/no_re: You will not regenerate any health without the regeneration status effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/overh: You overheat easily as a robot so you take extra fire and lava damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/rapid: [아이템 단축 바 불러오기 키] 당신은 이제 센트리입니다. 당신은 위험하니 조심하세요.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/regen: Activate self regeneration if you don't have enough health.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/steel: Your steel skin gives you the feel of a robot and solid metal comes through your blood and becomes electricity.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/stron: You can break natural stone much faster due to your Metal fists.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/tank_: Due to your steel metal skin you have 5 more hearts of health.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/unexh: Because you are a robot you won't get exhausted or hungry at all.
power.origins-plus-plus.part-robot/water: You're a robot so you don't need any oxygen.
power.origins-plus-plus.pixie/bite_sized: You are now four times smaller with five less hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.pixie/effect_glo: Being a being of pure fondness gives you permanent luck and a warming aura.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/dash.descrip: You can dash and get stronger and faster for a short time.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/dash.name: Dashing Supremacy
You can charge up your energy and distribute it to jump really high.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/jump_boost.d: You have a permanent Jump Boost & Slow Falling.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/no_food.desc: You can only eat flowers, leaves, grass, saplings, wheat, and hay bales for saturation.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/no_food.name: No Food
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/ram.descript: If you attack someone while sprinting, you ram them giving you bonus knockback on that attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.ram/ram.name: Ram
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/bite.desc: Your strong bite allows you to deal a little more damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/bite.name: Bite Force
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/higher_ju: You jump higher when you are sprinting due to your strong legs.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/light_arm: Since you are a fairly light creature, you can't wear armor that is too heavy, so you cannot wear anything above iron armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/pounce.de: You can jump forward into the direction you are looking at.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/small.des: As a descendant of the velociraptor, you are slightly smaller than the average human.
power.origins-plus-plus.raptus/smaller_b: Because your body is smaller, you are more fragile.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/nimble_limbs: You are a fast critter, being naturally faster than most and are able to attack faster than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/nocturnal_ey: Your eyes are not used to the sunlight, if you are under daylight, you will go blind.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/rats_eyes.de: Your eyes have adjusted well to the dark, allowing you see perfectly. But water causes your vision to diminish.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/slow_swimmer: You are small and your paws aren't made to swim faster, you are slower in the water.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/tail_whip.de: You are able to give your attacks strong knockback.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/toxicity_evo: Immune to poison effects caused by food.
power.origins-plus-plus.rat/vicious_bite: You can use your inherent rat abilities to deliver a powerful bite.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/attribut: You are 100% knockback resistant and naturally take slightly less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/axe_stre: You gain strength while holding an axe.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/bad_omen: Whenever a player kills you, they get the Bad Omen effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/clumsy.d: You cannot use shields, bows, and crossbows.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/dash.des: You are able to dash forward, giving you a chance to hit your enemies and sending them farther away.
You get tired faster than normal due to your size.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/fear.des: The golems can sense your kind, so they know what you're up to and don't take chances.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/hard_hit: Your immense strength causes your hits to launch your foes.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/heavy_ar: You can't wear any armor below diamond.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/heavy_fo: You trample farmland unless you are sneaking.
You are larger than the average person.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/slowness: Your species is heavy and bulky. You are permanently slowed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/team.des: Other pillagers are passive towards you because you are a relative to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/thick_sk: Your natural bulk gives you increased health and armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.ravager/vexy.des: You can summon a vex to fight for you, but they will die after some time.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/bamboo: You are able to consume bamboo!
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/cute.d: You can freeze all mobs in 30 block radius because of how adorable you are.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/flamma: Your fur makes you so fluffy! but it also means you take 50% more fire damage
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/jungle: Your homeland is the jungle, therefore you spawn in one.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/lazy.d: You move slower during the day because of your laziness.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/noctur: You spend most of your waking hours at night, allowing you to see better in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.red-panda/sharp_: Your claws and agility allow you to scale and climb blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/lig: Your need for agile movements while working with crops, is harder when wearing heavy armor. You prefer only to use leather armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/nim: You are fragile from working in the fields, so you have less health than humans.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/nou: You direct the earth's nutrients toward crops. Growing them in a matter of seconds.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/pac: You prefer escaping to fighting. Your attacks are weaker and there is a chance enemy attacks will leave you stunned.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/pho: This allows plants to get nutrients from the sun.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/str: Close proximity to farmland makes you feel at home, and makes you gain regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.reign-farmer/the: You can summon a random passive or neutral mob.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/city_m: Walking on purpur blocks will increase your armor as memories of your home come back.
One can only pass through the fabric of space so many times before it takes a toll on their body. You have far less hearts than the average human.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/incomp: The Nether rejects your essence, burning it the moment you enter. If you have at least 1 armor piece with Fire Protection II, this effect will recede.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/invert: Warp the essence of nearby ender pearls, making their wielder instantly teleport to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/portal: You are able to rip space and time apart to create a rift. Entering it will let you fly and phase through blocks around the rift. You can only own one rift at a time.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/return: Upon receiving a fatal blow, prevent it and return to your active rift.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/no_foo: You can only eat ender pearls, as a half-enderman being.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/no_pea: As you eat ender pearls, you don't see why you would waste them by throwing them.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/turn_p: With an amethyst shard and stone bricks, you can create a purpur block.
power.origins-plus-plus.rift-mage/water_: Water breaks down your skin, making you get hungry very fast. When there is no hunger to deplete, health will be taken instead.
Because you are a type of dragon, you have better vision. You can see mobs within a 32-block radius for a short time
You're used to poison, slowness, and weakness potions, so you have a chance to be cleansed of their effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/dark_color.d: Your scales are tinted gray, making you appear with a slight gray color.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/friendly_eye: Endermen are used to you, looking at an enderman will not anger them.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/healing_poti: You're only used to potions that cause damage; healing potions won't affect you.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/heavy_scales: Your winged boost is reduced when your health or hunger is too low, or when you're wearing heavy armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/lift_off.des: You're able to launch yourself into the air.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/natural_prot: Your scales provide natural protection, giving you 2 more hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/so_much_weig: Because you're heavier, you take more fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/sparkly.desc: Your scales reflect in the light.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/sparkly.name: Sparkly
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/winged.descr: You can propel yourself forward with your wings to get high speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ryu/winged.name: Winged Boost
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/cold: Your innate land is the hot desert so you are at a disadvantage in the cold.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/fles: There isn't much to eat in the desert so you have grown to like rotten flesh and get more nutrients from it but steak doesn't really taste as good to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/heat: Your time in the hot desert has made you immune to fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/no_h: From you times in the desert and living with husks, you have gained immunity to hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.sand-walker/sand: Your skin blends in with the sand.
You can shift through the sand like air.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/b: When exposed to light, you temporarily lose your sight. You can recover by hiding in dark spaces!
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/d: When in dark spaces you receive a boost to most stats and can see more clearly.
When it's day you receive debuffs as you cannot merge with the shadows around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/n: You do not need to eat food, as after hundreds of years your body has become adept at conserving energy. You regenerate infinitely, but slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow-crawler/s: You become a shadow, allowing you to instantly move 15 blocks in front of you.
You are darker and more transparent than most entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/cloud.des: You can transform yourself into dark energy, but it's to unstable to stay in that form for long. (You can also go through blocks)
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/hunger.de: Because eating food isn't an option, and you're a shadow, you are able to regain your hunger when in dark areas. This fills half of your hunger bar and gives regeneration for a short period of time.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/invisibil: In low light conditions, you become invisible, but moonlight and sunlight expose you.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/night_vis: 당신의 눈은 어둠에 익숙해져 영구적인 야간투시를 갖게 됩니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/no_food.d: 당신은 그림자이므로 음식을 먹을 수 없습니다
power.origins-plus-plus.shadow/sun_weakn: 태양은 많은 빛을 내는데, 이는 당신이 그것에 약하다는 것을 의미합니다. 거친 광선에 노출되면 속도가 느려지고 약해집니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/arachnid: §0사다리뿐만 아니라 모든 종류의 벽을 오를 수 있습니다.
§0당신은 보통보다 약간 작고, 짙은 회색이며, 6개의 체력를 가지고 있으며 살충으로부터 더 많은 피해를 입습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/avian/fr: §fy86 미만일 때 더 적은 피해를 입힙니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/blazebor: §c10초 동안 화염 피해를 입지 않으면 화염 피해를 25% 덜 받게됩니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/elytrian: §7천장이 낮은 곳에 있으면 몸이 약해지고 속도가 느려집니다.
§7비행하는 동안 50% 더 많은 피해를 주지만 비행하지 않는 동안에는 50% 적게 줍니다.
§7떨어지거나 블록으로 날아가 부딪히면 훨씬 더 많은 피해를 입습니다.
§7연약한 몸으로 인해 50% 더 많은 피해를 입습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/enderian: §5당신의 몸은 대부분의 사람들보다 더 어둡고, 체력은 8칸이며, 키는 보통보다 약간 더 크고, 보통보다 약간 더 얇습니다.
§5While not in the end, you deal slightly less damage.
§5You take damage while in contact with water.
§5You can reach blocks and entities slightly further away.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/h: §6You are small enough to sneak under a 1 block space and you only have 6 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/j: §6You are able to jump higher by jumping while sprinting.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/n: §6You can slightly see in the dark when not in water.
§6어떤 높이에서 떨어져도 낙하 피해를 받지 않습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/feline/w: §6You don’t deal any damage and you mine a lot slower unless you have strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/merling/: §3You can mine blocks underwater but on land you mine blocks slower.
§3You can breathe underwater, but not on land.
§3You are slightly smaller than normal, you’re blue, have 6 hearts and take more damage from impaling.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/no_elytr: You cannot equip an elytra, you already have a whole form for that!
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/phantom/: You can phase though walls for 10 seconds before needing to recharge it. When phasing, you are invisible, but you use exhaust quickly and mine slower.
You burn in sun light unless you are phasing or are invisible.
You are translucent and have 6 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shift_ba: Switch between origins by holding an origin's special item and press [Secondary]
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/ar: §dEven without wearing armor, your skin provides 2 natural armor bars.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/he: §dYou are purple, have 7 hearts, are 1 block tall and are slightly wider.
power.origins-plus-plus.shifter/shulk/no: §dYou can’t use shields, bows or crossbows.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/bite.name: Snek Bite
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/health.des: You have the health of a snek.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/intimidate: You can intimidate your enemies by hissing.
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/lunge.desc: [Shift + Jump] Sneks can lunge onto prey
power.origins-plus-plus.snake/lunge.name: Snekling Lunge
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/antivo: You are unable to eat the physical food like those with flesh.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/empty_: When your Soul Well drops below 25% you will be exhausted and require food quicker then normal. If you drop to 0% you will begin to die due to being a empty husk.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/energi: When your Soul Well is above 25% energy, you will gain buffs. At 25% you gain Night Vision and Speed. At 50% you gain Haste. At 100% you gain Strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/glowin: Your eyes are that of a soul and not designed for those of flesh. You struggle to see the world the same as others.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/lightw: Due to being half physical, your weight is much lesser compared to living, this means gravity and laws of the world don't effect you as much as those with flesh.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/resour: As a half Soul being, you need to fuel your soul by attacking entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/shader: As a Soul-Seer, you can see the souls of entities through all objects.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/soul_d: 반 영혼 존재이기 때문에 당신은 본질적으로 불안정합니다. 부상을 입거나 질주할 때 영혼의 샘을 모두 사용하게 됩니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/soul_s: 당신의 영혼과 같은 몸 덕분에 당신은 포만감을 느끼고 독립체를 공격할 때 영혼의 샘에 연료를 공급합니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/telepo: 당신의 영혼과 같은 몸으로 인해 당신이 볼 수 있는 모든 존재로 순간이동할 수 있습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.soul-seer/transp: 영혼과 같은 존재로서 당신은 물리적 세계에 약합니다. 당신의 체력은 육체를 가진 자의 절반입니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/accursed: 당신은 이전의 자신의 잔재일 뿐이므로 체력이 5칸뿐입니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/archange: 전직 대천사답게 키도 약간 크고 팔도 더 깁니다.
수천 년 동안의 싸움과 악마의 타락 이후, 당신은 화염에 적응하여 지옥불에 면역을 터득했습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/ethereal: 이전의 천상의 존재로서 배고픔과 중력은 당신에게 사소한 것입니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/fallen.d: 너무 단단한 물체는 비물질화하기 어렵습니다. 철, 다이아몬드, 네더라이트 갑옷은 착용할 수 없으며 방패는 사용할 수 없습니다. 저주는 모든 날개를 침식하므로 겉날개도 쓸모가 없습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/flesh_cr: 당신은 피가 닿지 않은 모든 음식을 싫어합니다. 고기만 먹을 수 있습니다. 인간의 살은 썩어도 배고픔을 더 채워줍니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/soul_dev: 이것은 한때 악마에게 사용되는 신성한 능력이었지만, 저주로 인해 사악한 형태로 타락했습니다. 명중 시 적의 영혼을 집어삼킵니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/soul_sac: 1.5칸의 체력를 소비하고 막대가 가득 차지 않은 경우 막대를 200 영혼 포인트로 채웁니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/spectre_: 빛과 어둠에 거하는 자로서 신에 필적하는 힘을 발휘합니다. 영혼 조물주 막대가 가득 차면 속도, 저항 및 가속을 얻습니다.

초기: 모든 효과를 정화하고 앞으로 돌진합니다. 활성 상태이고 막대가 비어 있지 않은 경우: 보이지 않고 무적상태이지만 몹을 공격할 수 없습니다. 기반암, 장벽, 흑요석 유형을 제외한 몹과 블록을 통과할 수 있습니다. 더 빠르게 비행하고 하강/상승하려면 스페이스을 두 번 탭하여 자연스러운 비행을 할 수 있습니다. 매 틱마다 2 영혼 포인트를 소모합니다. 비활성화된 경우: 1초 동안 힘이 3 증가합니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/transluc: 섬뜩한 저주는 당신을 약간 반투명하게 만듭니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/water_lo: The density of water restricts your movements. You swim three times slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/weakened: The cold weakens your protection against the curse. The decay by the curse deals damage to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/heart: Because you are a spirit, you've lost a life, giving you only 9 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/high_: You have to sleep above Y = 70.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/horn_: [아이템 단축 바 저장하기 키] 뿔에 아이템을 숨길 수 있습니다 (죽을 때 뿔 속의 아이템을 떨어트리지 않습니다).
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/mist_: You can summon a big mist cloud around you that starts to suffocate everything around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram/phase: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
Your attacks cause undead mobs to decompose faster for a short amount of time after being hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/decomp: Since you are a decomposer, you are immune to poison, hunger, and decay.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/health: You have less health, but at least you have more than before.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/jockey: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/light_: Due to your fragile mushroom cap, you can only wear armor up to iron level.
Now that you're bigger, you can handle armor up to diamond level.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/poison: Secondary Ability: Spread spores around you that poison all nearby entities in a 4 block radius.
After evolving, you spread stronger spores around you that inflict all nearby entities with poison II and wither in a 6 block radius.
You're tiny because you're only a spore.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/small_: You're not a spore anymore, but you're still a small mushroom.
power.origins-plus-plus.sporeling/updraf: Blast spores into your cap to launch you upwards.
Blast more spores into your cap to launch you higher upwards.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/adrenal: You gain speed, strength, and regeneration, but get down to two hearts when it wears off.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/burns.d: You take more damage to fire and lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/light_f: You are only slowed down to standard sprinting speed by soul sand.
You have two less hearts than normal.
You can use bows and crossbows to their maximum output, dealing more damage, knockback, and shooting from further away.
power.origins-plus-plus.sprinter/steroid: [아이템 단축 바 저장하기 키] 주 손에 아무것도 들고 있지 않다면, 체력을 10 회복합니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/equino: During the night time, you gain Speed II and Strength II.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/fragil: You take more fire and lava damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/hellis: You are immune to the wither status effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/monste: While in a light level of 7 or lower gain +50% attack speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/stargu: When holding a Nether Star, you gain Resistance II.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/starli: You gain immunity to daytime debuffs and gives invisibility and night vision, but armor shows and you can't attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.stargazer/sunbur: During the daytime (if not in Starlight Mode) gain Slowness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/ig: Water passes right through your body, So you can sprint at full speed underwater, But it also means you cannot swim.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/sk: As your soul begins to fade into memory, your skin becomes translucent.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/sp: You have a special connection with this object allowing you to see entities through blocks while using it.
power.origins-plus-plus.sunken-sailor/wa: You do not require air to survive allowing you to live underwater without dying.
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/blo:
You can trap any entity in a temporary jail cell.
§6(Mana Cost: 10000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/gra:
Shoot a grappling hook that allows you to swing and move around quicker.
§6(Mana Cost: 1000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/hea:
You are able to generate a quick burst of healing nanites which, upon release, will shoot out potent healing chemicals that will heal anyone within its radius (including yourself).
§6(Mana Cost: 10000)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/las:
You release a powerful beam of energy capable of breaking blocks.
§6(Mana Cost: 100/use [Hold])
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/nan:
Surround yourself in nanites, preventing all health loss, but freezing you in place.
§6(Mana Cost: 1000/second)
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/sum: Your powers are bound to the Staff of Aldo, a powerful staff first designed by the godfather of Technomancy, Aldo Aarif. Hold the staff in your offhand and [Right Click] with a conduit in your mainhand to cast the spell.
power.origins-plus-plus.technomancer/tec: As a Technomancer, your power to perform spells comes from natural energy sources. 'Tech Mana' as it is commonly known, is your natural source used to cast spells but these are often bounded to more technologically advance conduits. You gain Tech Mana naturally, as the world often brings little bits of electrical energy which you can use and convert into mana, but this process is slow. Standing on top of redstone-type blocks will absorb its energy and give you mana quicker.
Learning Technomancy is a craft of patience and sacrifice. No longer in your prime, your body worn by time, you move slower and have fewer hearts than most.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/conduc: Your body needs magic to live! Wearing any type of armor that isn't gold will slowly wither you away. Since golden armor is very weak, you've come up with a solution. By using gold blocks instead of gold ingots, you can make a reinforced golden armor piece.
Wearing, holding, or being hit by anything with a curse enchantment will affect you with Wither.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/empowe: While wearing a full set of armor with Thorns 3, you receive 40% less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/punchi: Being hit so many times has weakened you a lot so you deal 40% less damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.thornling/thorns: You're protected by a strange magical aura. When hit, the attacker will get damaged by one heart, this cannot be blocked by any type of armor or shield. You're also immune to thorns based damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.triangulon/bowma: You do extra damage with projectiles.
power.origins-plus-plus.triangulon/gravi: You can fly, have void immunity, and can walk on liquids.
power.origins-plus-plus.triangulon/mater: Summon an arrow out of thin air.
power.origins-plus-plus.triangulon/shulk: Shoot a barrage of shulker bullets.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/fire: Fire deals 2x damage to you. Additionally, when on fire it gives you Blindness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/heal: You have two more hearts because you fight a lot.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/high: The Vishaichian love shiny objects, its difficult for them to trade them away, annoying villagers which often times results in them increasing prices.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/natu: You are a skilled warrior, and therefore you possess abilities that increase your melee attack damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/raw_: You can only properly process raw meat.
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/summ: You summon up to 3 evoker fangs on enemies around you!
power.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian/upgr: You are a skilled warrior, and therefore you deal extra melee attack damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/arm: You cannot use armour with protection values above gold.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/cha: When shifted you regain divinity, used to use your abilities and enhanced attacks. Note: You cannot attack during this time
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/cur: When under the effect of slowness, you get weakness 100
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/dis: You can become invisible for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/dod: Automatically dodges the first attack you receive (with a cooldown).
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/no_: You are unable to use potions
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/smi: Your attacks link your target to the void, cleansing them of impurities
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/spe: You move a little faster than most
power.origins-plus-plus.void-samurai/unw: You can't use shields or ranged weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/brittle: You take more damage from kinetic base sources.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/dive_at: You deal more damage when diving towards a target.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/large_a: Because your body now requires more energy, causing you to eat more often.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/light_w: Your body is weak, unable to adapt to the light sources around you, giving debuffs as you cannot merge with the shadows created by the Void.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/low_hea: As a Voidborne, your adaptability in the skies have weakened you to the dangers below, you have 8 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/shadow_: When in dark spaces you receive a boost and can see better!
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/supreme: You can shape the void to help you create a shield that protects you from all damage but immobilizes you for its short duration.
When overcharged with Void Energy, you can enter the Supreme State. In this state you gain strength and become a glass cannon that multiplies all damage dealt and received.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_ch: Being part of the void, your body weakens the further away you are from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_en: You charge your body with the essence of the Void by being near bedrock. This Void Energy is then used for all of your abilities.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_fa: Now being one with the Void, your body rebels in the end dimension. Careful, your body still gets weakened in other dimensions.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/void_sh: You can call upon the Void to shield you in your time of need.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidbor: Your body has grown stronger, causing you to be able to step into the light but becoming more transparent the further you stray from the Void.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidlin: You are darker and more transparent that most entities, you also give off some particles!
You've learnt to give yourself a boost in direction you're looking with the wings The Void has gifted you when flying.
power.origins-plus-plus.voidling/winged_: You struggle to stay afloat when your health or hunger is too low, or when you're wearing heavy armor. Flying boosts will exhaust you more and propel you less when wearing heavy armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.volcanic-dragon/: Hunger goes down a bit quicker.
Your scales are hard and tough to cut through, giving you 2 natural armor bars.
Your natural home is near lava. So, you spawn in the Nether.
You gain slowness and weakness in cold biomes.
Because of your lineage, you get 2 more hearts.
You are able to boost with the flames that surround you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/as_s: Sneak while falling to slow fall.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/deat: You gain life by damaging or killing others.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/floa: You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/ghos: Villagers won't trade with you and iron golems will attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/phas: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/righ: 대장장이는 당신에게 불리하게 작업하고 철과 금 아이템은 당신에게 추가 피해를 입히며 철이나 금 갑옷을 입을 수 없습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/spit: Any mobs/players that hit you with melee attacks will receive slowness and weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/the_: You can see in the dark.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/touc: Applies wither to anyone you hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.wailing-one/wail: Sing your Death Knell to damage and wither all who stand in front of you!
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/bag.des: A wanderer always needs a trusty pouch with them.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/cross.d: Due to your body being used to travel, you became a little weaker to fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/healing: When within two blocks of a light source, you start to heal. Soul variants satiate you instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/leather: Wearing leather armor gives you additional armor, speed, and an attack damage buff.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/night.d: During the night you become faster but also weaker. Weakness can be combated by holding a shield at the expense of losing your speed boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.wanderer/trade.d: You are merchant, prices go down when you're around.
power.origins-plus-plus.wandering-spirit: 무언가를 치명타로 때릴 때 25% 확률로 3개의 하트만큼의 피해를 받습니다.
피해량 버그
Fire exorcises you, so you take extra fire damage.
Fire Weakness
When in dark areas your vision sucks, so you get blindness (unless you have night vision).
Need Glasses
You can summon a great storm that will strike lightning around you. (Uses hunger)
Lightning Charge
You cannot be affected by lightning.
Lightning Invulnerability
You are able to summon a lightning strike where you're looking. (Uses hunger).
Electrokinesis
You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
Phase
Due to your nature, you have learned to move faster than most. This allows you to mine and move faster than others.
Quick Hands and Feet
You are always shaking. The thought of the approaching night always on your mind.
Shaking
You can switch between Small, Normal and Large size.
Morphing
At night you are afraid of the dark, so you get slowness and weakness. (Unless you have night vision)
The Darkness
You deal more damage with axes.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/born_in_: You are connected to fire, so you have permanent Fire Resistance.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/hungry.d: It is very hunger-consuming to fight so much.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/moonligh: Sun = fire and fire = good, so you have weakness during night time when there is no sun.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/no_range: You are inexperienced with any ranged weapons so you don't use them
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/not_a_ra: You are more skilled using swords and axes. Bows deal more damage to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/philza_r: Elytrians deals 2x damage when attacking you.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/strong.d: You have a lot of experience in wars, so you have extra health.
power.origins-plus-plus.war-god/swordsma: Swords feel natural - you are very skilled with bladed weaponry so deal more damage with it.
Adrenaline rushes through your veins when the thought of a good battle comes to mind, causing you to deal more damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/blind.des: You cannot see very well as you have evolved to live in total darkness. When in darker spaces, you can see slightly better.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/echolocat: You can shriek to detect nearby mobs and cause them to glow.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/health.de: You have extra hearts and permanent strength.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/phase.des: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/size.desc: You are shaped like a warden: tall and wide.
power.origins-plus-plus.warden/size.name: Warden's Body
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/rust.d: You start to rust when wet, causing you to get weakness and slowness in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/scotop: You have night vision, allowing you to see in the dark
power.origins-plus-plus.warforged/weapon: Your body is a weapon, allowing you to do more damage to enemies
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/ender_che: [아이템 단축 바 저장하기 키] 당신의 맞춤형 엔더 상자에 접속하여 아이템을 저장할 수 있습니다. 죽을 때 아이템을 떨어트리지 않습니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/fall_brea: Press the sneak key to stop your fall. Make sure to time it correctly.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/food.desc: Due to your time spent in the End, you can eat end stone.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/food.name: Reliable Food Source
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/passive_e: Endermen will not become aggressive towards you, unless you attack them.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/portality: [Primary/Secondary] You can summon a portal. When you have two portals, you can teleport between them by standing close to them. (Works across dimensions.)
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/random_te: When you take damage from anything other than water, you'll randomly teleport.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/spawn.des: You come from and belong to the end.
[아이템 단축 바 불러오기 키] 당신이 보는 곳으로 순간이동합니다 (32블록 이내).
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/weak.desc: Your health is reduced to 5 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.warper/weak.name: Weak
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/art: Being near paintings satisfies your inner artist, replenishing your hunger slowly.
You learnt a special recipe to make the constant painting easier on your resources. You can craft wool with just 2 string.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/era: Erase the color of the entity you're looking at. Use [Shift] too to self-cast.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/fra: Due to neglecting your physical health, you only have 8 hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/mag:
With the respective dye in hand, click to fire a ray of §4red§r, §3blue§r or §2green§r energy that colors entities around the impact. (Syntax is Attacker -> Target) 
§3Blue§r -> §3Blue§r or §4Red§r -> §4Red§r pulls the target entity to the attacker.
§3Blue§r -> §4Red§r or §4Red§r -> §3Blue§r applies extra knockback to the attack.
§2Green§r + §4Red§r creates §6Yellow§r, which causes the entity to glow brightly and be seen through walls.
§3Blue§r -> §2Green§r heals the target entity and creates a water block at its feet for a moment.
§2Green§r -> §3Blue§r steals health from the target entity to restore health for the attacker.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/no_: Food restores no hunger for you, as you're beyond it. Only paintings satisfy you.
You can't stand your colorful nature being suppressed, so you're immune to Invisibility.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/pai: One of your creations is a set of armor painted with a grey color, which grants you innate armor. However, other armor is barely effective.
power.origins-plus-plus.witch-of-ink/rea: Fire a ray that reanimates the first painting it hits, turning the entities in them alive. They will be passive to you. (Doesn't work for all paintings)
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/ber: As having a fox also being your ancestor you have grown a strong liking to sweet berries so they fill you more.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/fea: As you are related to the wither, undead mobs are afraid of you so they won't attack you. Also, the Wither likes you so it too will not attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/flo: You float instead of jumping (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/har: Due to your hard skin you have natural protection
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/hea: Your body has withered your hearts away.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/hom: Your natural spawn is the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/imm: Due to living in the nether you have grown an immunity to poison, hunger, wither, nausea, and weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/pri: You like to steal things from people so to hide those things you need to put them in your mouth.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/pro: Your wither ancestor has pasted on the ability to be more resistant to attacks and make you immune to projectiles when on half health.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/qui: Due to constantly running from hunters you have devolved natural speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/sec: Due to one of your ancestors being a wither they have passed down their ability to shoot wither skulls to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/sma: One of your ancestors is a fox so you are a block and a half tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/stu: As you skin is very hard you are immune to sweet berries and cacti.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/und: You count as an undead mob, so you take increased from Smite and some potion effects are reversed.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-fox/wit: Your claws are filled with a dangerous disease so melee damage infects enemies with your sickly disease.
power.origins-plus-plus.withered-skeleti: You spawn in the Nether, and like your brothers and sisters, you spawn in a fortress with them.
Blazes, Wither Skeletons, and Skeletons are all your allies and will not attack you.
Stone Swords do similar damage to diamond axes.
You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Smite.
Applies the wither effect on your opponent for a short period of time after hitting them.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/ball.desc: With your magic you summon a fireball.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/ball.name: Fireball Spell
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/broom.des: When holding a stick you get slow falling
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/flight_ki: When holding a feather you gain levitation
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/health.de: The extra magic in your body goes to your health.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/immune.de: You are immune to poison, wither, and weakness
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/light.des: With a stick in your hand you summon lightning on whoever you hit.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/magic.des: Due to your body constantly expelling magic you have permanent regeneration.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/old.descr: You are slower due to being old and your frail skin takes more damage from explosions.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/old.name: Old
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/respect.d: Illagers respect you because of your wise knowledge and will not attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/second.de: When you're supposed to die you have a totem-like effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skin.desc: Due to your sensitive skin you can only wear armor up to iron.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skin.name: Sensitive Skin
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/skulls.de: [아이템 단축 바 저장하기 키] 해골 폭탄을 소환합니다.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/vex2.desc: Vexes love you cause you are a kind wizard and will protect you.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/vex2.name: Ghost Summoner
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/villagers: Villagers recognize you as a wise wizard thus lowering their trades.
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/why.descr: You can't use totems cause why should you? You cheat death by yourself!
power.origins-plus-plus.wizard/why.name: Why?
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/claws.d: You have large powerful claws, allowing you to do more damage to enemies
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/night_v: You have night vision, allowing you to see in the dark
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/project: You can breath out large clouds of poison
Because you are a descendant of wyverns, you have a weaker body and thus cannot wear armour with protection higher than chainmail.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/size.de: Similar to most other dragons, you are taller than most
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/water.d: Your wings get heavier when they're wet, causing you to get weakness and slowness in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.wyverian/wind.de: You can use your large wings to flap!
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/acro: You have speed and you also fall to the ground slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/heli: When in harsh lighting conditions, you get Blindness and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/nice: Because you're so nice to everyone; creepers, spiders, skeletons, and zombies won't attack you unless provoked. You also get good discounts for villager trades.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/supe: You go into a very resistant state that makes you invulnerable to any type of damage and you deal 2x damage, but after you use this ability you get Slowness, Weakness, and Hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/tall: Your used to being under taller roofs so when you are right under a block you get Weakness and Hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.zero-aizawa/weak: Because your arms are weak you can't really wear netherite properly so you get Slowness II with netherite armor on.
